name: A necklace of sparkling iridium
data: It decreases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity pitifully.
It decreases the users constitution unnoticably.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It decreases the users intelligence a bit.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
